import React from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import './FormInput.css' const IndexPage = () => { const url ="https://test-api-6e645-default-rtdb.firebaseio.com/data.json" const [data,setData] = useState({ title : '', price : '', date : '' }) function changeHandler(e){ const newData = {...data} newData[e.target.name] = e.target.value setData(newData) console.log(newData); } function submitHandler(e){ e.preventDefault() Axios.post(url, { title : data.title, price : data.price, date : data.date }).then(res => {console.log(res.data)}) } return (

Welcome to ProductList App

Submit New Item View All Products

Register Product

submitHandler(e)}> changeHandler(e)} value={data.name} type="text" name="title" placeholder='Enter Title'/> changeHandler(e)} value={data.name} type="number" name="price" placeholder='Enter Price'/>
